DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy safety Clobetasol propionate Vehicle treatment mild moderate plaque-type psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Efficacy Tolerability Clobetasol Propionate Foam Compared Vehicle Foam
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study compare efficacy safety Clobetasol propionate Vehicle treatment mild moderate plaque-type psoriasis . This multi-center , double blind , randomize , parallel design study consist 2 week treatment follow-up visit 2 week later .

Female subject childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test result baseline practice reliable method contraception throughout study . Mild moderate , plaquetype psoriasis Target lesion trunk extremity ( exclude palms/soles , elbow , knee ) score 2 3 erythema , scale plaque thickness Able understand requirement study sign Informed Consent/HIPAA Authorization Forms . Subjects legal age consent state study conduct must also write , informed consent parent legal guardian .
